1: I trust and receive just deliverance and honor.
2: I receive swift help and stand secure in a strong refuge.
3: Steadfast protection brings clear guidance and purposeful direction.
4: Depend on strength; walk free and secure.
5: I entrust my spirit to truth and receive lasting freedom
6: I trust the enduring truth that sustains me.
7: I rejoice in compassion that knows and cares for me
8: I stand secure in a wide, spacious place.
9: Mercy restores my eyes, soul, and body to wholeness.
10: Peace fills my years, and my strength grows with healing.
11: Compassion unites neighbors and acquaintances in steadfast support.
12: Build compassionate community so everyone stays seen, valued, and whole.
13: Stay courageous and safe; your life stays secure.
14: I trust you and declare my wholehearted devotion.
15: I am safe, protected, and free in every moment.
16: Merciful favor shines and brings lasting protection.
17: I call on the divine and stand confident and secure.
18: Truthful, respectful speech prevails and honors those living justly.
19: Trust brings abundant goodness shown openly to everyone.
20: Protective presence shelters all, bringing deep peace and quiet unity.
21: Marvelous kindness flourishes within a strong, secure community.
22: I call, and help swiftly arrives.
23: Love and faithfulness bring steadfast protection.
24: I stay courageous; hope strengthens my heart.
